name: Trại Điên Homestay

location.address: Tổ 2, thôn Hòa Trung, Hòa Ninh, Hòa Vang, Đà Nẵng, Thôn Hòa Trung, Việt Nam

description:
Trại Điên Homestay, a property with a garden, is located in Thôn Hòa Trung, 24 km from Golden Bridge - Ba Na Hills, 24 km from Indochina Riverside Mall, as well as 24 km from Cham Museum. This homestay is 25 km from Love Lock Bridge Da Nang and 27 km from Asia Park Danang.

Song Han Bridge is 24 km from the homestay, while Ba Na Hills is 24 km away. The nearest airport is Da Nang International Airport, 21 km from Trại Điên Homestay.

name: Bana Rita Farm & Camping

location.address: Thôn Hội Phước, Xã Hòa Phú, Hòa Vang, Hòa Vang, Việt Nam

description:
Bana Rita Farm & Camping features mountain views, free WiFi and free private parking, located in Hòa Vang, 20 km from Golden Bridge - Ba Na Hills.

There is a shared bathroom with a bath or shower and a hair dryer in each unit, along with free toiletries.

An Asian breakfast is available daily at the campground.

Guests can also relax in the garden.

Ba Na Hills is 20 km from Bana Rita Farm & Camping, while Asia Park Danang is 20 km away. The nearest airport is Da Nang International Airport, 17 km from the accommodation.

name: Nhà Nghỉ Tấn Phúc

location.address: Số 120 tổ 7 thị trấn Đồng Văn, Thôn Phước Sơn, Việt Nam

description:
Situated in Thôn Phước Sơn, within 20 km of Indochina Riverside Mall and 20 km of Cham Museum, Nhà Nghỉ Tấn Phúc features accommodation with a terrace and as well as free private parking for guests who drive. The property is around 21 km from Love Lock Bridge Da Nang, 21 km from Golden Bridge - Ba Na Hills and 22 km from Ba Na Hills. The property is non-smoking and is located 20 km from Song Han Bridge.

With a private bathroom fitted with a bidet and slippers, rooms at the guest house also boast free WiFi, while certain rooms come with a balcony.

Asia Park Danang is 23 km from Nhà Nghỉ Tấn Phúc, while Marble Mountains is 29 km from the property. The nearest airport is Da Nang International Airport, 17 km from the accommodation.

name: V Village

location.address: Hòa Hải, Hòa Phú Sau lưng nhà văn hóa thôn Hòa Hải, Hòa Vang, Việt Nam

description:
Located in Hòa Vang in the Da Nang Municipality region, V Village provides accommodation with free private parking.

Guests at the luxury tent can enjoy an à la carte or an Asian breakfast.

Guests can enjoy the outdoor swimming pool and garden at V Village.

Asia Park Danang is 23 km from the accommodation, while Golden Bridge - Ba Na Hills is 23 km away. The nearest airport is Da Nang International Airport, 19 km from V Village.

name: Ebisu Onsen Resort

location.address: QL14G, Hoa Phu, Hoa Vang, Da Nang, Ba Na, Việt Nam

amenities: Trung tâm Spa & chăm sóc sức khoẻ
description:
Tọa lạc tại khu du lịch Bà Nà, khách sạn 4 sao Ebisu Onsen Resort có khu vườn, sân hiên, Wi-Fi miễn phí và quầy lễ tân 24 giờ. Quý khách có thể nếm thử các món nướng/BBQ và các món ăn Châu Á tại nhà hàng trong khách sạn.

Mỗi phòng nghỉ tại khách sạn đều được trang bị tủ quần áo và phòng tắm riêng với bồn tắm cùng đồ vệ sinh cá nhân miễn phí và tầm nhìn ra núi. Ngoài ra, mỗi phòng còn được trang bị tủ lạnh.

Chỗ nghỉ này cung cấp bữa sáng kiểu lục địa và tự chọn hàng ngày.

Tại Ebisu Onsen Resort, du khách có thể thoải mái sử dụng bồn tắm nước suối nóng, bể sục và phòng xông hơi khô.

Ebisu Onsen Resort cách thành phố Hội An 60 km, thành phố Đà Nẵng 30 km và sân bay gần nhất là sân bay quốc tế Đà Nẵng 28 km.

name: BUNGALOW DANANG Healing Homestay

location.address: Quốc lộ 14B - Thôn Cẩm Toại Trung - Xã Hòa Phong - Huyện Hòa Vang- TP. Đà Nẵng Quốc lộ 14B - Thôn Cẩm Toại Trung - Xã Hòa Phong - Huyện Hòa Vang- TP. Đà Nẵng, Khương Mỹ (2), Việt Nam

description:
Featuring pool views, BUNGALOW DANANG Healing Homestay in Khương Mỹ (2) features accommodation, free bikes, an outdoor swimming pool, a garden and a bar. Both WiFi and private parking are accessible at the lodge free of charge.

Fitted with a terrace, the units offer air conditioning and feature a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with shower and free toiletries. A fridge and minibar are also available, as well as a kettle.

A buffet, American or Asian breakfast can be enjoyed at the property.

A car rental service is available at BUNGALOW DANANG Healing Homestay.

Asia Park Danang is 14 km from the accommodation, while Cham Museum is 17 km from the property. The nearest airport is Da Nang International, 11 km from BUNGALOW DANANG Healing Homestay, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: OYO 1185 Ha Thu Motel

location.address: 250, 250, Duong So 5, P Hoa Hiep Nam, Quan Lien Chieu, Thanh pho Da Nang, Viet Nam, Da-Nang, Đà Nẵng, Việt Nam

description:
Featuring 3-star accommodation, OYO 1185 Ha Thu Motel is situated in Da Nang, 1.9 km from XuanThieu Beach and 2.3 km from Nam O Beach. This 3-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with a private bathroom. The hotel has family rooms.

All rooms at the hotel are fitted with a seating area and a TV.

Indochina Riverside Mall is 13 km from OYO 1185 Ha Thu Motel, while Song Han Bridge is 13 km from the property. The nearest airport is Da Nang International Airport, 10 km from the accommodation.

name: V2 House

location.address: 08 Ngô Mây, Quy Nhơn, Việt Nam

description:
V2 House provides accommodation located in Thôn Phước Sơn, 19 km from Indochina Riverside Mall and 19 km from Cham Museum. Complimentary WiFi is providedthroughout the property.

Some units include a terrace and/or a balcony.

Song Han Bridge is 19 km from the apartment, while Love Lock Bridge Da Nang is 21 km away. The nearest airport is Da Nang International Airport, 16 km from V2 House.

name: Mộc Nhiên Hotel Da Nang

location.address: 18 Phạm Văn Ngôn, Đà Nẵng, Việt Nam

description:
Set in Da Nang, within 1.8 km of XuanThieu Beach and 10 km of Indochina Riverside Mall, Mộc Nhiên Hotel Da Nang offers accommodation with a garden and free WiFithroughout the property as well as free private parking for guests who drive. Featuring family rooms, this property also provides guests with a terrace. The property is non-smoking and is situated 10 km from Song Han Bridge.

At the guest house, all rooms are fitted with a wardrobe, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen and towels. The units will provide guests with a fridge.

Cham Museum is 11 km from Mộc Nhiên Hotel Da Nang, while Love Lock Bridge Da Nang is 12 km away. The nearest airport is Da Nang International Airport, 7 km from the accommodation.
